statements: SELECT * FROM employee_training_completion_records ORDER BY completion_date DESC, employee_id ASC
SELECT employee_id, training_module_name FROM employee_training_completion_records WHERE compliance_status = TRUE
SELECT training_module_name, completion_date FROM employee_training_completion_records WHERE employee_id = 5
SELECT * FROM employee_training_completion_records WHERE training_module_name LIKE '%compliance%'
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id FROM employee_training_completion_records
SELECT * FROM employee_training_completion_records WHERE employee_id = 123 ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, training_module_name FROM employee_training_completion_records WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM employee_training_completion_records WHERE training_module_name LIKE 'Cyber%';
SELECT employee_id, MAX(completion_date) AS latest_completion_date FROM employee_training_completion_records GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT employee_id, AVG(CAST(compliance_status AS INT)) AS compliance_rate FROM employee_training_completion_records GROUP BY employee_id HAVING AVG(CAST(compliance_status AS INT)) > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT employee_id, name, department FROM Employee WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT name, hire_date FROM Employee ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, training_module, completion_date FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT name, department FROM Employee WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE completion_date >= '2020-01-01' ORDER BY completion_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT employee_id, name, department FROM Employee WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY name
SELECT employee_id, training_module, completion_date FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE training_module LIKE 'SQL%'
SELECT e.employee_id, e.name, etr.training_module, etr.completion_date FROM Employee e INNER JOIN EmployeeTrainingRecords etr ON e.employee_id = etr.employee_id
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords etr JOIN Employee e ON etr.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE etr.completion_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY etr.completion_date ASC
SELECT * FROM employee WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, department FROM employee WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT full_name, hire_date FROM employee ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT e.full_name, t.training_name FROM employee e JOIN employee_training et ON e.employee_id = et.employee_id JOIN training t ON et.training_id = t.training_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM training WHERE passed = TRUE;
SELECT full_name, department FROM employee WHERE hire_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, full_name, department FROM employee WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT e.full_name, e.department, t.training_name FROM employee e JOIN employee_training et ON e.employee_id = et.employee_id JOIN training t ON et.training_id = t.training_id WHERE t.passed = TRUE;
SELECT e.full_name, e.hire_date, t.training_name FROM employee e LEFT JOIN employee_training et ON e.employee_id = et.employee_id LEFT JOIN training t ON et.training_id = t.training_id;

SELECT e.full_name, e.department, COUNT(et.training_id) AS num_trainings FROM employee e LEFT JOIN employee_training et ON e.employee_id = et.employee_id GROUP BY e.full_name, e.department HAVING num_trainings > 2 ORDER BY num_trainings DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, hire_date FROM employees WHERE hire_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, duration_hours FROM training_courses WHERE duration_hours > 10 ORDER BY duration_hours ASC;
SELECT employee_name, compliance_status, record_date FROM employees JOIN compliance_records ON employees.employee_id = compliance_records.employee_id WHERE compliance_status = 'Complete';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees
SELECT * FROM training_courses WHERE duration_hours > 10
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales'

SELECT employee_name, course_name, completion_date FROM employees JOIN employee_training ON employees.employee_id = employee_training.employee_id JOIN training_courses ON employee_training.course_id = training_courses.course_id
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY record_date DESC
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT training_name, completion_criteria FROM trainings WHERE completion_criteria = 'Pass/Fail';
SELECT employee_id, training_id, completion_date FROM employee_training_completion_records WHERE completion_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM compliance_policies ORDER BY policy_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_training_completion_records WHERE completion_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employees ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT training_name, training_description FROM trainings WHERE completion_criteria = 'Pass';
SELECT employee_id, training_id, assignment_date FROM training_assignments WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM compliance_policies;
